description.excerpt: A comparative experiment on using Leslie Smith's work on 1cycle Policy for hyper-parameter tuning (Learning rate and momentum) of DNNs.
A comparative experiment on using Leslie Smith's work on 1cycle Policy for hyper-parameter tuning of DNNs.
